title: Vooglam Embrace Style 'Tribes' in New Rebranding
description: Introducing seven distinct collections, each based on a different subculture and drawing upon its unique codes, including: Rave Culture (Electronic Dance Music), Cyberpunk (high-tech urban futurism), and Pan-African (Afrofuturism).
